name: Real Fast Speed Racer 3D
description:
Real Fast Speed Racer 3D is a car racing game with other traffic on the road. Control the car avoiding collision and such things on road. Avoid colliding with anything such as truck, car or road barrier.
Collect Coins to make good score and to make your health better.
You have to collect power boosters to boost up your speed. See real physics coming in action on the asphalt highway roads with terrific cars and traffic vehicles. let the adrenaline come in action and make real heavy thrust to the vehicles and car just try to be a good driver and enjoy the show on road with nice car AI of traffic.
play Speedy Sports Car for thrill and adventure.
Check your expertise in this game for car controlling.
